name: Pygame Hangman
description:
This is single and multiplayer Hangman Game made with pygame

there are several topics to choose from one is sport and second one is Fruits if your going to play 2 players it has both of the options if your going to player single player you will be playing with the only fruits options each topic contains 6 level once you beat all the level you would be thrown back to the main loop I must say its harder then you think any issues please report to me on instagram @bruh_habib1 Thank You And Enjoy
